title: Fantasy Game UI Sounds
description: A collection of fantasy inventory containing 236 sound effects - weapon and item equipment, interface buttons, notepad and pencil, magic book, purchases and item usage sounds.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/fantasy-game-ui-sounds

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/s9mhtvkoygxq2ad/MSE%20-%20Fantasy%20Game%20UI%20Sounds_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


A collection of fantasy inventory sound effects of weapon and item equipment, interface buttons, notepad and pencil, magic book, purchases and item usage sounds.


The package includes 236 sound effects divided into 6 folders - "Equip", "Interface", "MagicBook", "Note", "Purchase" and "Use":


  1. The "Equip" folder contains the sounds of equipping wooden and metal items such as weapons or armor, glass, gears and other items - 68 sound effects inside. 
  2. The "Interface" folder contains the interface sounds - select and click, button, raise lower, confirm and level up - 77 sound effects inside.
  3. In the "MagicBook" folder you will find sounds for opening and closing the magic book, flipping pages - 16 sound effects inside.
  4. The "Note" folder contains sounds of using a pencil, flipping pages, sounds of the next page - 17 sound effects inside.
  5. In the "Purchase" folder you will find sounds for making purchases and sales using coins - 18 sound effects inside.
  6. The "Use" folder includes sounds of using glass, metal, wood and other items - 40 sound effects inside.


Use this asset to add sound colors to your inventory, menus and interfaces, taking their sound to the next level in your medieval and dark fantasy game, whether it's a role-playing game, strategy game or anything else.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 236 sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 68 sounds of equipping
  • 77 interface sounds
  • 40 item usage sounds
  • 16 magic book sounds
  • 17 notepad sounds
  • 18 purchase sounds
  • great for RPGs, strategy games, games in the genre of medieval fantasy, dark fantasy and others


Number of Audio Waves: 236

Number of Audio Cues: 236

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 04 minutes 14 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
